channel.title: [718/742] Lost Redemption - The Redemption of a Lifetime
channel.description:
Lost Redemption is a brand new RuneScape Private Server, filled with the NEWEST items around such as the Saradomin's Whisper, Saradomin's Murmur, and much much more! You can experience this brand new server by downloading the file [URL=http://205.196.120.178/8437tw2g3xwg/nceqhfwukpe4w6f/Play+Lost+Redemption%21.jar]HERE[/URL]. I really hope you enjoy your play at Lost Redemption and to see you in game!
Thank you! ~Derek Owner
[URL=http://depositfiles.com/files/fg4laaxrj][MIRROR][/URL]
Features:
~VPS Hosted 24/7 ~Economy ~99.9% Working Money Pouch ~Perfected Pking ~King Black Dragon [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/KingBlackDragon_zpsf3c15cd3.png[/img] ~Queen Black Dragon [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/QBD_zps1d4bc953.png[/img] ~Fully functioning Fight Caves [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/FightCaves_zpsb719b56b.png[/img] ~Fully functioning Fight Kiln [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/FightKiln_zps36924314.png[/img] ~Updated Godwards Dungeon bosses [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Bandos_zps196f91fa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Zamorak_zps5e26b7ef.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Saradomin_zps95314aba.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Armadyl_zps56e0e697.png[/img] [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Nex_zpsd341b100.png[/img] ~Corporeal Beast [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/Corp_zps91fd7433.png[/img] ~Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m627/derek5116/TormentedDemons_zps08a08fe0.png[/img] ~Barrows ~Dominion Tower ~Duel Arena ~Donator Zone ~Dicing ~All Prayers Working (Curses included) ~All updated amour ~Lots of skilling ~Loyalty Program (with aura shop) ~An owner that actually CARES about the players :) ~Much, much more!
**More Screenshots Coming Soon!

Seems like a pretty good server, I’ll give it a try.

item.title: [718/742] Lost Redemption - The Redemption of a Lifetime
item.dc:creator: @lost_redemption lost redemption
item.description:
@lost_redemption wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:480114”][quote author=lost redemption link=topic=598349.msg4295914#msg4295914 date=1368221053]
The server forums are ONLINE! You can access them by going to http://lostredemption.com! Also, there have been tons of updates to he server including faster speeds! Check us out! We are sure you will choose us as your permanent private server!
[/quote]
So you made an account to bump your thread?[/quote]

Not necessarily, I was intending on making a username that is specific to the server, so I guess it went both ways. I needed this just to relate to my server more.

Read full topic
